title: Reality Show Contestants Continue To Make Headlines And Other Top Entertainment Stories
text:
When asked who has the caliber to win the show, he said, “Fair play wise I would say Shefali, Paras and Rashami, and talent-wise Shehnaz”.

Defeating their fellow contestants, Popular television couple Prince Narula and Yuvika Chaudhary have won Nach Baliye 9. Hassanandani-Rohit Reddy and Vishal Aditya Singh-Madhurima Tuli were announced as the first and second runner-up respectively.

Don't Miss 492 SHARES 49.2 K SHARES 8 K SHARES 21.9 K SHARES

Nawazuddin Siddiqui’s journey in Bollywood has been nothing short of inspiring. From years of struggle to blink-and-miss roles in films like Munna Bhai MBBS to now becoming one of the most sought after actors, Nawazuddin is one of the most loved stars of the nation.

According to a report in some of the leading websites, Akshay has donated Rs 1 crore to rehabilitate 25 families that have affected by the floods in Bihar.

Just a few weeks ago, she officially shared the news of her pregnancy. The picture she shared took over the internet and they went viral for all the right reasons. Sharing the news of her pregnancy, she said she was feeling relieved that she does not have to hide her baby bump under layers of clothes.
description: Nawazuddin Siddiqui’s journey in Bollywood has been nothing short of inspiring. From years of struggle to blink-and-miss roles in films like Munna Bhai MBBS to now becoming one of the most sought after actors, Nawazuddin is one of the most loved stars of the nation.
